card.name: Thrash Crawler
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a card from your mana zone to your hand. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Tick Tick, Swift Viral Swordfighter
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

card.name: Mind Reset
card.text: ■ Look at your opponent's hand and discard a spell from it.

card.name: Dorgedos, the Reaper Drake
card.text: ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This turn, that creature can't block.

card.name: Pipippi, Electro-Riser
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an evolution creature, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Tensai Janit of the Hidden Blade
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fuuma Gorgonshack
card.text: ■ All spells cost 2 more to cast.

card.name: Antoinette, Beautiful Battle Dragon Princess
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose one of the following. :► Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. :► Discard your hand and then draw the same number of cards that you discarded in this way.

card.name: Startdash Reviver, Crystalline Shadow
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water or darkness creatures. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Your water Hunters can't be attacked. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.text: ■ Psychic Link—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Hunting ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.text: ■ Psychic Link—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Hunting ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Atsuto, Duel Hero Strategist
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: Mother Alien (Gladly)
card.text: ■ Each of your Aliens in the battle zone gets "Saver: Alien". ''(When one of your Aliens would be destroyed, you may destroy a creature that has "Saver: Alien" instead.)'' ■ Double Breaker ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Mother Alien (Gladly)
card.text: ■ Each of your Aliens in the battle zone gets "Saver: Alien". ''(When one of your Aliens would be destroyed, you may destroy a creature that has "Saver: Alien" instead.)'' ■ Double Breaker ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Alien Father (Just 1 Song?)
card.text: ■ All Aliens in the battle zone get "Slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ Psychic Link—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Alien Father (Just 1 Song?)
card.text: ■ All Aliens in the battle zone get "Slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ Psychic Link—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Fused Dreadnought! Jet Cascade Attack
card.text: ■ Your Hunters can't be attacked or blocked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw up to 3 cards. Then reveal any number of cards in your hand. For each card revealed, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that costs the same as or less than that revealed card and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Fused Dreadnought! Jet Cascade Attack
card.text: ■ Your Hunters can't be attacked or blocked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw up to 3 cards. Then reveal any number of cards in your hand. For each card revealed, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that costs the same as or less than that revealed card and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Hyperspatial Killer Glasses Hole
card.text: ■ Choose a number. Then look at your opponent's hand. For each card that costs the same as the chosen number, draw a card. ■ Put up to 2 water psychic creatures that have total cost 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Infernal Death Sunrise
card.text: ■ Each creature in the battle zone gets -1000 power for each darkness card in your mana zone until the End Step
